message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that could significantly enhance your [specific field or lifestyle], potentially saving you thousands of dollars in the long run. Given its unique features and the value it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects the quality, rarity, and potential benefits the product can bring to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this a mutually beneficial transaction.
